char_4145_ulpia.name: 本性的坚守
char_4145_ulpia.descCN: 每次受到伤害时，治疗自身80点生命值；生命值低于50%时，治疗效果提升至120点生命值
char_4145_ulpia.desc: When taking damage, recover 80 HP, when HP less than 50% recover 120 HP

char_4145_ulpia.name: 本性的坚守
char_4145_ulpia.descCN: 每次受到伤害时，治疗自身100点生命值；生命值低于50%时，治疗效果提升至160点生命值
char_4145_ulpia.desc: When taking damage, recover 100 HP, when HP less than 50% recover 160 HP

char_4145_ulpia.name: 血脉的哺养
char_4145_ulpia.descCN: 每次击倒一名敌人时，自身的生命上限提高120，攻击力提高30，最多叠加9次，其他【深海猎人】干员获得50%的提高效果
char_4145_ulpia.desc: When defeating an enemy,Max HP +120, ATK +30 (stacks up to 9 times), other [Abyssal Hunter] Operators receive 50% of effect

char_4145_ulpia.name: 血脉的哺养
char_4145_ulpia.descCN: 每次击倒一名敌人时，自身的生命上限提高120，攻击力提高30，最多叠加10<@ba.talpu>（+1）</>次，其他【深海猎人】干员获得50%的提高效果
char_4145_ulpia.desc: When defeating an enemy,Max HP +120, ATK +30 (stacks up to 10<@ba.talpu>(+1)</> times), other [Abyssal Hunter] Operators receive 50% of effect

char_4079_haini.name: 测绘器材的奇用
char_4079_haini.descCN: 攻击范围内的非精英和领袖敌人获得8%的<$ba.fragile>脆弱</>效果
char_4079_haini.desc: Inflict 8% <$ba.fragile>Fragile</> to non-Elite and non-Boss in Attack Range

char_4137_udflow.name: 细胞活性抑制剂
char_4137_udflow.descCN: 攻击使目标在3秒内每秒受到40点法术伤害（对【海怪】敌人伤害加倍）
char_4137_udflow.desc: When attacking, dealing 40 Arts damage to them per second, lasting 3 seconds (damage is doubled against [Sea Monster])
